      • resetAll

        public static boolean resetAll(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String pass)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Reset the entire database. Delete all inputs, set counters to 0. Only Tal and Lior should use this method.
        Parameters:
        name - of the user
        pass - of the user
        Returns:
        true if the data base is reset
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the access to database failed

      • searchPlaceOfInterest

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> searchPlaceOfInterest(java.lang.String placeName,
                                                                           java.lang.String placeDescription,
                                                                           java.lang.Integer cityId)
                                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        search function. if a parameter is null, we ignore it. When searching by description, we look for a POI such that every word from the query description is a substring of the POI description.
        Parameters:
        placeName - the name of the place we want to search
        placeDescription - the place description we want to search
        cityId - the id of the city we want to search
        Returns:
        the result list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the access to database failed

      • searchMap

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> searchMap(java.lang.Integer cityId,
                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                               java.lang.String info,
                                                               java.lang.String imgURL)
                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        search function. if a parameter is null, we ignore it.
        Parameters:
        cityId - the id of the city we want to search
        name - the name we want to search
        info - the info data we want to search
        imgURL - the image url we want to search
        Returns:
        : the result list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the access to database failed

      • searchCity

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> searchCity(java.lang.String cityName,
                                                                java.lang.String cityDescription)
                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        search function. if a parameter is null, we ignore it. When searching by description, we look for a city such that every word from the query description is in the city description.
        Parameters:
        cityName - the city name we want to search
        cityDescription - the city description we want to search
        Returns:
        the result list.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the access to database failed
